Purpose: To provide a standardized procedure for producing accurate and reliable P53 immunohistochemistry staining results.
Container: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue block (FFPE block) or positively charged glass slide
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, automated immunostainer (e.g., Ventana BenchMark or Dako Autostainer), microscope, slide-drying oven
